parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new TableStyle

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the TableStyle.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyle with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyle with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyle with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyles within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The TableStyle, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TableStyle, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The TableStyle, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TableStyle, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first TableStyle in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last TableStyle in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle TableStyle in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyle with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the TableStyle that follows the desired TableStyle.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyle whose index follows the specified TableStyle in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The TableStyle whose index comes before the desired TableStyle.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any TableStyle in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every TableStyle in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TableStyle.
Returns the TableStyle with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
